Defect: Soot may build on the piston ring causing the ring to seize in the groove allowing combustion gases to by-pass the piston. If not rectified this if ignored could cause the piston to overheat and melt.
Remedy: Recall the vehicles that are likely to be affected to reprogram the engine ECU with new version software to change the pilot injection timing.

Concern: Existing recall number with a new model
Defect: Soot may build on the piston ring causing the ring to seize in the groove allowing combustion gases to by-pass the piston. If not rectified this if ignored could cause the piston to overheat and melt.
Remedy: Recall the vehicles that are likely to be affected to reprogram the engine ECU with new version software to change the pilot injection timing.

Defect: The emergency brake may inadvertently apply  due to the 'Y' couplings not being to the required specification and failing.
Remedy: Recall the trailers that are likely to be affected  to replace the 'Y' couplings with ones of the correct specification.
